name: Akbar 'em All
description:
This game doesn't reflect nor means to spread any political or religious belief.

It's a short game made in 48h with Construct 2, based on platformers, Hotline Miami and Counter Strike. Some of Sound Effect are from CS 1.6.

This is our first particpation in the Ludum Dare. On the brainstorm, we just a little take away the theme. (But the beard grown, look at it, it took a lot of effort)

Hope you won't be shocked by the dark humor's aspect of this game. Just enjoy !

Team Composition :

Khelian - Art & Music

Mat Rexus - Game Design and Programming
